doc.repnme: West Bank and Gaza - Public Financial Management Reform Trust Fund Project : release of third tranche - full compliance
doc.abstracts: The Public Financial Management Reform Trust Fund Project first tranche was released on April 30, 2004, and the second tranche released on July 21, 2004 to the Palestinian Authority (PA). This document summarizes the actions taken by the PA in fulfillment of the benchmarks, and ongoing prior actions. In view of the overall performance, and progress with the implementation of the Public Financial Management Reform Program, and in compliance with the specific prior actions and benchmarks as described in paragraphs 1-16 of the document, the Bank has informed the Recipient of the release of the third tranche.
